data.title: International Surf Lifesaving Association
data.meta_description: Four Huntington Beach Junior Lifeguard Instructors Peter Eich, Scott  Hunthausen, Olin Patterson, and Henry Reyes started ISLA in 2008. The  four friends...
data.text:
Four Huntington Beach Junior Lifeguard Instructors Peter Eich, Scott Hunthausen, Olin Patterson, and Henry Reyes started ISLA in 2008. The four friends wanted something to bond their friendships for life and to continue their for passion lifeguarding. The idea started as a realization when Scott returned home from a study abroad semester in Nicaragua where he experienced the drowning of his host familyâ€™s son, and witnessed the alarming drowning rates in the country during the 4-day Semana Santa holiday (Easter).
